Class QuadraticEquation

  • java.lang.Object
    • QuadraticEquation

  • public class QuadraticEquation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has the methods to compute the solutions of a quadratic equation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuadraticEquation(float a, float b, float c)
      This constructor initializes all the coefficients of the quadratic equation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getA()
      This method gets the squared coefficient.
      float getB()
      This method gets the linear coefficient.
      float getC()
      This method gets the constant coefficient.
      FloatPair getRealSolutions()
      This method computes the solutions for the quadratic equation.
      int realSolutionsCount()
      This method computes how many solutions the quadratic equation has.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuadraticEquation

        public QuadraticEquation(float a,
                         float b,
                         float c)
        This constructor initializes all the coefficients of the quadratic equation.
        Parameters:
        a - The coefficient of the squared term.
        b - The coefficient of the linear term.
        c - The coefficient of the constant term.

    • Method Detail

      • getA

        public float getA()
        This method gets the squared coefficient.
        Returns:
        Returns the squared coefficient.

      • getB

        public float getB()
        This method gets the linear coefficient.
        Returns:
        Returns the linear coefficient.

      • getC

        public float getC()
        This method gets the constant coefficient.
        Returns:
        Returns the constant coefficient.

      • realSolutionsCount

        public int realSolutionsCount()
        This method computes how many solutions the quadratic equation has.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of solutions.

      • getRealSolutions

        public FloatPair getRealSolutions()
        This method computes the solutions for the quadratic equation.
        Returns:
        Returns a reference to a FloatPair which contains the solutions.
